title: Xbox controller buttons quit working with Android 11. Tried 3 different controllers and updating.
content: 3 different fully updating xbox controllers no longer work with my pixel 2 in apps. Only a,b,x,and y are doing anything. Outside of apps, all the buttons work fine. Everything worked on android 10 but once I updated to 11 the controllers quit. Any other similar problems out there after android 11 update?
